file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-42-01-06 - COCKPIT-UNDERFLOOR ACCESS HATCH - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL COCKPIT-UNDERFLOOR ACCESS HATCH - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do an inspection on the cockpit underfloor access-hatch mechanism. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY COCKPIT UNDERFLOOR ACCESS- ALL 52-42-01-200-801-A ♦ HATCH MECHANISM - DETAILED IN- SPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-42-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-42-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. COCKPIT UNDERFLOOR ACCESS-HATCH MECHANISM - DETAILED INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to do an inspection on the cockpit underfloor access-hatch mechanism. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION COCKPIT UNDERFLOOR ACCESS HATCH - REMOV- AMM TASK 52-42-01-000-801-A/400 AL COCKPIT UNDERFLOOR ACCESS HATCH - INSTAL- AMM TASK 52-42-01-400-801-A/400 LATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 123 123BL Area below the cockpit floor - LH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the maintenance shop I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A CAUTION: AFTER YOU REMOVE THE COCKPIT UNDERFLOOR ACCESS HATCH, PUT IT ON A SAFE SURFACE TO PREVENT SCRATCHES. (1) Remove the cockpit underfloor access hatch (AMM TASK 52-42-01-000-801-A/400). J. Inspect (Detailed Inspection) Cockpit Underfloor Access Hatch Mechanism (Figure 601) SUBTASK 220-002-A (1) With the mechanism on the locked position, examine the bellcrank, the lock rod, the lock pin, and the door lock (Figure 601). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 52-42-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) After you examine the components, actuate the handle and move the mechanism to the unlocked position and examine the parts of the lock pin which were inside the door lock. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the cockpit underfloor access hatch (AMM TASK 52-42-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 52-42-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
